content.question: In Paragraph 2 ("Black men ... participate"), the author juxtaposes two versions of "preaching" primarily to

choices.label: dismiss the notion that men and women inhabit separate spheres
suggest that women use language for less useful ends than men do
convey her appreciation for Black women's eloquence in the home
underline the constraints on Black women both in church and at home

content.answer: convey her appreciation for Black women's eloquence in the home

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
